text: Nikolay Havrylovych Shmatko () (17 August 1943 - 15 September 2020) was a Ukrainian sculptor and painter. He was born in the Donetsk region of Ukraine. In 2004, for his work "Sviatohorska Blessed Virgin" - a statue of the Virgin Mary (Theotokos "Hegumenia") for Sviato-Uspenskyi Sviatohorskyi Monastery - Shmatko was awarded the order of Nestor Letopisets by Volodymyr Sabodan, the Kyiv Metropolitan, and all of Ukraine. Shmatko died on 15 September 2020 in Kyiv at the age of 77.Умер украинский скульптор Николай Шматько ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Donetsk Oblast Category:Ukrainian painters Category:Sculptors Category:20th- century painters Category:21st-century painters Category:Soviet artists
